abilities.name: Sturdy
abilities.description: On a Pokémon with Sturdy, recoil moves that would cause a knockout have no effect. In Generation I, being switched out cannot give a knockout.

abilities.name: Unnerve
abilities.description: Opponents cannot learn a move through a TM/Machine, a Move Tutor, an evolution, or by level-up, if this Pokémon is holding an ORG For Help on a student.
